summary: Women amputees, in particular, have unique needs when they seek prosthetics. For example, there may be fewer commercially available prosthetic devices available for women. Women are also studied less than their male counterparts in prosthetic and amputee rehabilitation research. Prosthetic care is an important part of veterans health care. This statement for the Congressional Record discusses the prosthetic services the Veterans Health Administration provided to...
title: Veterans Health Care: Information on Agency Efforts to Provide and Study Prosthetics for Female Veterans
